title: How to Love Your Teddy Bear

steps.headline: Name your teddy.
steps.description:
Be creative you can find inspiration anywhere;
Your favorite foods such as Cookie, Apple pie, Banana, Muffin, Fudge, or Chip  as in chocolate chip. Colours and shapes such as Pinkie, Rose, Midnight, Blackie, Blu/Boo, Tri, or Roundy. Types of weather such as Snowy, Blustery, Misty, Rainy, Cloudy, Sunny, or Sunshine.

steps.headline: Make your teddy comfy.
steps.description: Make them clothes and a bed. Make a spot in your room to use as your teddy's little corner.

steps.headline: Be kind and gentle with your teddy.
steps.description: Treat your teddy like a real bear.

steps.headline: Groom your teddy with a soft brush.
steps.description: Keep your teddy looking nice and his fur soft.

steps.headline: Be a teddy bear doctor.
steps.description: If your bear encounters an accident, approach the situation creatively. Patch up any boo boo's with a band-aid and a kiss.

parts.name: Spending Time with Your Teddy Bear

steps.headline: Take your teddy wherever you go.
steps.description: Teddy bears love to go to movies and sleepovers. Make sure he/she doesn't wander off when your not looking. Bears aren't very good with direction and can't get home by themselves.

steps.headline: Hug and kiss your teddy  before you go to bed.
steps.description: Teddy's love cuddles make sure you sleep with your teddy. Make pajamas, slippers, and an eye mask for the teddy.

steps.headline: Talk to your teddy about your feelings.

text:
Looking After Your Teddy Bear Name your teddy. Be creative you can find inspiration anywhere;
Your favorite foods such as Cookie, Apple pie, Banana, Muffin, Fudge, or Chip  as in chocolate chip. Colours and shapes such as Pinkie, Rose, Midnight, Blackie, Blu/Boo, Tri, or Roundy. Types of weather such as Snowy, Blustery, Misty, Rainy, Cloudy, Sunny, or Sunshine. Make your teddy comfy. Make them clothes and a bed. Make a spot in your room to use as your teddy's little corner. Be kind and gentle with your teddy. Treat your teddy like a real bear. Groom your teddy with a soft brush. Keep your teddy looking nice and his fur soft. Be a teddy bear doctor. If your bear encounters an accident, approach the situation creatively. Patch up any boo boo's with a band-aid and a kiss. Spending Time with Your Teddy Bear Take your teddy wherever you go. Teddy bears love to go to movies and sleepovers. Make sure he/she doesn't wander off when your not looking. Bears aren't very good with direction and can't get home by themselves. Hug and kiss your teddy  before you go to bed. Teddy's love cuddles make sure you sleep with your teddy. Make pajamas, slippers, and an eye mask for the teddy. Talk to your teddy about your feelings.
